desc: We create unique concepts and multi use products which not only adds charm to a space but are also strong and durable. A lot of the products are manufactured with recyclable materials like metal and also by using metal that would have otherwise seen the scrap heap!Designmint has wide category of products,like Wall Art

layout.text: Bespoke metal art and decor from Designmint is born out of a lifetime of love for art, design and sustainability resulting in designs that are great-looking, functional and Earth-friendly.
